name: WORST (playinful)
description:
This is just a joke game I made over the course of 3 days for the YouTuber/Twitch streamer BikdipOnABus. It's dumb and not fun lol

You can use the arrow keys, or WASD, or 2468, or a controller, to play. Select a letter with SPACE or ENTER or any of the face buttons. To quit the game press ESC or the START button (or equivalent) on your controller.
